update t_user_hero_skill
user_hero_id = #{userHeroId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update t_user_hero_skill set user_hero_id = #{userHeroId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, skill_id = #{skillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_sequence = #{useSequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depiction = #{depiction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, target_num = #{targetNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aim_target = #{aimTarget,jdbcType=CHAR}, affect_type = #{affectType,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, need_zhenyuan = #{needZhenyuan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cd = #{cd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attack_rate = #{attackRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cont = #{cont,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select tuhs.* from t_user_hero_skill as tuhs left join t_user_hero as tuh on(tuhs.user_hero_id = tuh.id) where tuhs.user_id = #{userId} and tuh.action_status = '2' and tuhs.is_use = '1'
